message: Let's make a deal. Take this offer, Bob, or risk losing out in the next round!
Alice, let's be reasonable. This offer is fair and avoids further losses from inflation.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is my final offer - take it or leave it!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Take it before inflation eats away at your share too!
